title: Scout Willis zips across the street in a green top and jeans after a shopping trip in Los Angeles
text:
Her mother Demi Moore recently unveiled decades of family turmoil and topped the New York Times Best Sellers lists with her new memoir Inside Out.

But Scout Willis didn't seem to have a care in the world as she was spotted shopping Monday in Santa Monica, California.

The 28–year–old musician was seen running across the street ahead of traffic after checking out new clothing.

Speed demon: Scout Willis, 28, looked for traffic as she ran across the street after shopping for clothing at Santa Monica's Reformation boutique on Monday

Scout was dressed simply for her outing in a plain green shirt with her sleeves rolled up slightly.

She had it loosely tucked in to a pair of tight blue jeans with short slits at the bottom that accentuated her slender figure.

The 5ft7in daughter of Bruce Willis raised her height a bit with a pair of brown suede boots.

Her voluminous brunette locks whipped around in the breeze as Scout ran, and she carried along a large coffee in one hand while keeping her bags over the other shoulder.

Simple style: Scout was dressed simply in an emerald green shirt that she tucked into a tight pair of blue jeans

Brunette beauty: The daughter of Demi Moore and Bruce Willis completed her look with a pair of light brown boots, and she wore her voluminous brunette tresses down

Scout gave her 132K Instagram followers some insight into her outfit and her clear skin earlier in the day.

She shared a photo of herself seated in the car with a jet black items covering her exposed chest and neckline.

'@fitbib Protecting my precious décolleté from sun damage,' she captioned the photo, drawing attention to the bib.

The garment's manufacturer advertises the item as a means of protecting exposed chests from sunburn and long-term sun damage.

Scout removed the covering in a follow-up shot to show off her seemingly undamaged skin.

Bundled up: Scout posted photos of her top in the car, this time with a black covering over her exposed chest and neck

Protecting herself: The Fitbib was designed to block out UV rays and protect from sunburns and skin damage, especially on seemingly innocuous car rides

Scout got in some shopping at Santa Monica's Reformation, a boutique that advertises sustainable women's clothing.

Her outing came shortly after the publication of her mother Demi's shocking memoir Inside Out.

The Ghost actress, 56, shares information about her traumatic rape at the age of 15, as well as details about her tumultuous marriage to Ashton Kutcher from 2005–2003.

According to an insider who spoke to People, their marriage 'really played havoc with her self confidence' and 'confused about her life and what direction her career would take as she got older.'

Family business: Scout's shopping trip came shortly after her mother published her shocking tell-all memoir Inside Out, which recounts her tumultuous marriage to Ashton Kutcher; Scout pictured with (L-R) Tallulah Willis, Rumer Willis and Demi Moore

Their separation 'was just a nightmare for' the actress and 'it took her years to get over it,' the source told the outlet, to the point 'she was really struggling mentally and didn't take care of herself.'

One trouble portion of the book delves into her 2012 overdose from inhaling nitrous oxide (or laughing gas) and smoking synthetic marijuana.

'Everything went blurry and I could see myself from above,' she wrote of the near-death experience.

'I was floating out of my body into swirling colors, and it seemed like maybe this was my chance: I could leave the pain and shame of my life behind.'

The drug scare sent the actress to rehab, though she seems to have turned things around for the better.
description: Scout Willis was spotted running across the street after going for a shopping trip in Los Angeles. The daughter of Bruce Willis and Demi Moore was dressed in a green top and tight blue jeans.
